column1: SELECT *, MIN(ST_Distance(ST_MakeValid(Infralineaire_now.geom), ST_MakeValid(Desordre_now.geom))) AS Distance  FROM Desordre_now INNER JOIN Observation_now ON Observation_now.lid_desordre = Desordre_now.id_desordre INNER JOIN Infralineaire_now JOIN Zonegeo_qgis ON ST_WITHIN(ST_MakeValid(Desordre_now.geom),ST_MakeValid(Zonegeo_qgis.geom)) GROUP BY Desordre_now.id_desordre
